clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Terpin hydrate is used in the treatment of acute and chronic bronchitis pneumonia bronchiectasis chronic obstructive pulmonary disease infectious and inflammatory diseases of the upper respiratory tract

contraindications.disease: Overdose can cause nausea vomiting and abdominal pain
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: It acts to facilitate the removal of mucus from the respiratory tract It prevents the exacerbation of excessive mucus production and secretion due to airway bacterial or viral infections asthma or chronic bronchitis Expectorants like terpin hydrate change mucus consistency and make coughing more productive
